des:
Control your SG Smart devices throughout the home with voice commands using Alexa.

A SG Smart Gateway connected to your SG Smart devices and the Internet is required in order to use this skill.

SG Smart devices supported:
• smart dimmers
• DINs
• on/off pills
• smart plugs
• tunable white dimmers

To get started, select the "Enable" button in the Alexa App, and login with your SG account. After your SG account is linked, Alexa will discover your devices. You can then name your devices and group them.

Use distinct and simple names for your devices so that you can easily identify them.
E.g. Desk lamp, ceiling light

Groups defined in the SG App are not imported to Alexa. Please use the grouping in the Alexa app instead.


You can then control the devices by saying things like:
• "Alexa, turn on Desk Lamp"
• "Alexa, brighten Desk Lamp to 80%"

For tunable white dimmers, you can say things like:
• "Alexa, set Ceiling Light to warm white"
• "Alexa, make the Ceiling Light cooler"

Shortcuts and scenes defined in the SG App will also be available to Alexa:
• "Alexa, activate Cinema"
• "Alexa, turn on Away"


NOTE: Not all features on SG Smart devices are fully compatible with Alexa.
